sentences: Hän oli viileä ja rauhallinen tilanteessa.
context: The Finnish word 'viileä' can mean cool, chilly or refreshing depending on context. It describes something that has a pleasant low temperature - cooler than room temperature but not cold enough to be unpleasant. It can describe weather (a cool day), drinks (cool water), or someone's demeanor (being calm and unflappable).
